segments.text: I see the woman is really focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't even noticed the water overflowing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad seeing the girl waiting so eagerly for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks like she's been waiting for a while.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, he's not even noticing the stool wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the woman to realize what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just streaming down the cabinets, creating such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm the scene outside the window looks compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everyone stays safe and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
